    • Method Detail

      • isValidSuit

        public static boolean isValidSuit(char suit)
        Tests if a char represents a valid suit.
        Returns:
        true if k in CLUBS | DIAMONDS | HEARTS | SPADES

      • isValidRank

        public static boolean isValidRank(char r)
        Tests if a char represents a valid rank.
        Returns:
        true if k in '2'..'9' | TEN | JACK | QUEEN | KING | ACE

      • suitLessThan

        public static boolean suitLessThan(char s1,
                                   char s2)
        Tests if a suit is value of a suit is less than the value of another suit following the order CLUBS < DIAMONDS < HEARTS < SPADES.

      • rankLessThan

        public static boolean rankLessThan(char r1,
                                   char r2)
        Tests if one rank is less then the other following the order '2' < '3' < ... < TEN < JACK < QUEEN < KING < ACE.

      • isRankFollowing

        public static boolean isRankFollowing(char r1,
                                      char r2)
        Tests if one rank directly follows the other according to '2' < '3' < ... < TEN < JACK < QUEEN < KING < ACE.

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Tests if this card is equal to another (i.e., same suit and rank).
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - Card to be compared.
        Returns:

      • ltSuit

        public boolean ltSuit(Card card)
        Tests if this Card is less in suit than another Card.
        Parameters:
        card - Card for the comparison.
        Returns:
        true if the suit of this Card is less than that of card.
        See Also:

      • ltRank

        public boolean ltRank(Card card)
        Tests if this Card is less in rank that another Card.
        Parameters:
        card - Card for the comparison
        Returns:
        true if the rank of this Card is less than that of kaart.
        See Also:
        rankLessThan(char, char)

      • isInRankBefore

        public boolean isInRankBefore(Card card)
        Tests if this Card is directly followed in rank by another Card. Does not consider suit. see isRankFollowing(char, char)
        Parameters:
        card - Card for the comparison.
        Returns:
        true if the rank of this Card directly precedes the rank of card.
